name: Idle Transport Tycoon (itch)
description:
Untitled Clicker Game is a Idle Clicker Game, In this game you can mange, upgrade, & sell stuff.  As you grow your transport comapny, you will want to buy more Vehicles and upgrades.

Features
  • A save system (Saves In Browse) So no need to save a string of random numbers!).
  • Many types of upgrades.
  • User Input... Well the game is a prototype I will be taking in a load of user input, from new servers, to completely new features. If you want to contribute to the game. Leave a comment with your feature idea.
Current Release status

      The game is not yet done, but the game is done in early access for you to play. The game is free on web-player for the foreseeable future. Thanks for reading, have a good day!
